secret_rule: Only items that are associated with a famous event in history can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "moon rock" and "Declaration of Independence".
No, you cannot bring a dinosaur fossil.
Player: Can I bring the "Eiffel Tower"?
No, you cannot bring the Eiffel Tower.
Player: Can I bring the "Mona Lisa"?
No, you cannot bring the Mona Lisa.
Player: Can I bring the "Constitution of the United States"?
Yes, you can bring the Constitution of the United States.
Player: Can I bring the "Liberty Bell"?
Yes, you can bring the Liberty Bell.
The rule seems to be that you can only bring items that are related to American history or space exploration.
